tasks.release: git checkout production && git merge main && git push origin main production --tags && git checkout main
tasks.bump:major: pwsh -c 'git tag -l --sort=-creatordate | select -First 1 | %{"$([int]$_.split(".")[0] + 1).0.0"} | %{git tag $_}' && deno task release
tasks.bump:minor: pwsh -c 'git tag -l --sort=-creatordate | select -First 1 | %{"$([int]$_.split(".")[0]).$([int]$_.split(".")[1] + 1).0"} | %{git tag $_}' && deno task release
tasks.bump:patch: pwsh -c 'git tag -l --sort=-creatordate | select -First 1 | %{"$([int]$_.split(".")[0]).$([int]$_.split(".")[1]).$([int]$_.split(".")[2] + 1)"} | %{git tag $_}' && deno task release
